title: The Garmin Vivoactive 3 is cheaper than ever - but hurry this offer ends Sunday
author: tabitha-baker
summary: A record low price on the entry level smartwatch
article: Garmin smartwatch deals can offer up some excellent discounts on high performance fitness trackers this weekend, but the pick of the litter is this excellent $60 discount on the Garmin Vivoactive 3. That brings the final price down to just $89.99 - beating its previous record low by $10.

That means you're getting a fantastic all-round smartwatch with plenty of fitness features for a stunning price. Complete with touchscreen display, notifications right to your wrist, and preloaded sports apps that include presets for yoga, running, swimming and more, the vast majority of users will find the best value in this model.

However, if you're looking for something a little more tailored to long distance running, hiking, or a premium all-in-one luxury experience, we're also seeing Garmin smartwatch deals on a range of models from the Forerunner 45 (now $147.96, was $199.99) to the Garmin Venu (now $259.98, was $349.99).
Not in the US? Scroll down for more Garmin sales in your region.

If you're interested in checking out some other brands, we're rounding up all the latest cheap smartwatch deals right here. However, it's worth noting that Fitbit deals are usually strong this time of year as well, and we're seeing some excellent Apple Watch sales right now too.
